GlossaryTerm.TermName: summary logarithm of the odds score

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The summation of all positive pedigree LOD scores (statistical estimates of whether two genetic loci are physically near enough to each other on a particular chromosome that they are likely to be inherited together) at each point in the genome. Also called sumLOD score.
